item.description:
"Golf 101 Is A Complete Hands-On Course Ideal For New Golfers And Anyone Who Wants To Improve Their Game"

"Golf 101 Starts At The Driving Range, And Then Brings You On The Course For Real Playing Experience"

Golf 101 starts out at the driving range, developing your swing, video swing analysis, golf rules, terms and strategy.

Next, we work on putting and chipping. The next lessons are on the golf course to play a scramble, learning about technique, course management, rules, and scoring.

All clubs, equipment, driving range fees, golf course fees, and golf balls are included,
-or bring your own clubs.

The 4 Golf 101 Lessons total 6 hours of hands-on instruction is only $100 ($17 per hour) and are taught by Certified Golf Professionals
Class size is kept small to ensure personal attention - the best value available in Golf Lessons anywhere!

"The best way to improve your Golf score is out on the course with playing Golf lessons -Having a Golf Pro teach and coach you while you are playing Golf is so much better than just practicing on the range."

Starting with the basics of Golf, you will learn how the game is played, terminology, technique, strategy, and skills to make you a competitive Golfer.

Each lesson starts with 30 minutes of warm-up including stretching, putting and chipping -or hitting a bucket at the driving range.

Next, on to the Golf Course and Driving Range with our Golf Pro, as he helps you improve your swing, technique, and course management while you play - so there is no down-time.

Video Swing Analysis is included to help you improve your swing and technique

RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY!

Your 4 Golf 101 Lessons are:

Saturday July 12 -4 to 5:30 pm
Saturday July 19 -4 to 5:30 pm
Saturday July 26 -4 to 5:30 pm
Saturday August 2 -4 to 5:30 pm

or

Monday July 7 -6:30pm to 8:00pm
Monday July 14 -6:30pm to 8:00pm
Monday July 21-6:30pm to 8:00pm
Monday July 28 -6:30pm to 8:00pm


Reserve Your Spot Today!


Sign up below by clicking on PayPal, Visit www.CTGolfTips.com, or call (860) 436-9449
CTGolfTips.com is able to offer Golf 101 Lessons at an unbeatable price
- just $100 for 6 Hours of Golf Instruction ($17 per Hour)

Golf 101 Lessons are held at:

Miner Hills Golf Course and Driving Range, 85 Minor Hills Drive, Middletown, CT 06457 Take Exit 20 Country Club Road from I-91

From 91 South - Take exit 20, Left from exit ramp, Left on Country Club Road, Left on Minor Hills Drive, 1 mile on your Right

From 91 North -Take exit 20, Right from exit ramp, Left on Minor Hills Drive, 1 mile on your Right
